1356570.name: Tesla Force Soundtrack
1356570.description:
DOUBLE FEATURE

This amazing DOUBLE feature soundtrack contains boths soundtracks for Tesla Force and Tesla vs Lovecraft.

All tracks are available in lossless high-quality FLAC, as well as compact-sized MP3 formats.

Soundtrack Credits

  • Music by Pandocrator
  • Audio mastering by George "Cydelix" Deligiannis
  • Additional Guitars by Streetwise Rhapsody and Graphomet

Tesla Force Notes:
  • 6. (Combat) This is Lovecraft Country REMIX
  • 7. (Mech) The Pigeon of War EXTENDED
  • 8. (Mech) The Power of Science EXTENDED

Tesla vs Lovecraft Notes:
  • 3. (Mech) Stomping Metal EXTENDED
  • 6. (Mech) Time to get Heavy EXTENDED
  • 10. (Mech) Science is not Afraid! EXTENDED
  • 11. (Mech) For Science! EXTENDED
